title: How Talk Radio Unites Ron Johnson and His Wisconsin Voters
description: The Republican senator from Wisconsin practically lives on talk radio, with hundreds of appearances in 2022. It keeps him in tune with base voters, and is helping him in his vital Senate race.
dc:creator: Reid J. Epstein
media:credit: Jamie Kelter Davis for The New York Times
media:description: “Talk radio is crucial to the conservative movement, because we don’t have the mainstream media on our side,” Senator Ron Johnson said in a recent interview.
